department: Public Works and Government ServicesDepartment of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Construction of new Government of Canada building)
description: To construct a new Government of Canada building in Stellarton, NS; the project includes the construction of a new heavy timber wood framed building, structural, mechanical, electrical, civil, and landscaping as required. The estimated cost for this opportunity is within the following cost category: between $20,000,001 to $40,000,000. Work to be completed within 80 weeks of contract award with an additional 8 weeks for RCMP fit-up.
full_summary:
# ITQ - Construction of new Government of Canada building – Stellarton, NS

### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

#### Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4635636126
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4635636126
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Publication Date**: June 14, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 9, 2024 at 2:00:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Specifications

* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services (CNST)
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
* **Trade Agreements**: Various (Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, etc.)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia (Nouvelle-Écosse)
* **Regions of Award**: None

#### Contractor Requirements

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
* **End User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Timothee Beausoleil
* **Contact Email**: [timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20023868?extsite=MjAwMjM4NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for a Contractor to construct a new Government of Canada building in Stellarton, NS. The Work of the Project generally involves the following:
